Dgame.Math.VecN



struct VecN(T, const(uint) Dim) if (isNumeric!(T));
VecN is a minimalistic structure for N dimensional coordinates and without unnecessary functionality.

Author:
rschuett

T[Dim] values;
Stores the vector values.

this(U...)(U values);
CTor

const pure nothrow T opDispatch(string str)();
opDispatch for x, y, z, w, u, v components

const pure nothrow Vector2!(T) getAsVector2();
Returns a 2D Vector

const pure nothrow uint getDim();
Returns the dimension

alias vec2f = VecN!(float, 2).VecN;
Alias for a two dimensional vector.

alias vec3f = VecN!(float, 3).VecN;
Alias for a three dimensional vector.

alias vec4f = VecN!(float, 4).VecN;
Alias for a four dimensional vector.

alias vec6f = VecN!(float, 6).VecN;
Alias for a six dimensional vector.
